Build the chapel.

A year.

I love you truly
Truly, dear

我的爱人
就像在荆棘丛中绽放的百合

悲伤便消失在梦中

这样美好

You're so beautiful.

Your new song.
My new song?
It's good.

-I feel you should hear it. -Maybe later.

-晚点再说吧

Me too.

"Something" is gonna be incredible after you hear this song.

等你听过这首歌后
这件事会变得很神奇

Sit down.

translation.en: Had a hole in my heart A pain so strong

等待是值得的

Awaken love, awaken love

This is love as it was meant to be

Come on.

Love is the power that heals

Rose.
